thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: I purchased a new vivape2 and it worked for only a few days before it no longer functioned properly. I reached out to the manufacturer and got no response. However, the customer service from Vapornation responded very quickly and started the return process. Not only did they promptly respond to my issue, but they also went above and beyond and are working with me with shipping costs. I've dealt with Vapornation many times in the past and this was the only time I had an issue with a product. I now have the piece of mind knowing if I ever encounter another problem, I'm in good hands and Vapornation will take care of me. Special shout out to TJ at Vapornation, he really stepped up to the plate and swung for the fences regarding the shipping policy. You guys will continue to receive my business. Thanks again.
